title: Drawing, "An Artist Drawing by Lamplight", 1800–20
medium: Black chalk on heavy wove paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: Museum for the Arts of Decoration Cooper Union (Lugt 457c)
inscribed: Inscribed in brown ink, upper left: Uno; in graphite, lower left: Piancastelli Hewitt G. 650
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: A heavily draped figure, seated, facing left draws upon a slanted surface resting in his lap. At left, a long pole supports the lamp illuminating the writing surface, leaving much of the figure in shadow.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "An Artist Drawing by Lamplight", 1800–20.
1800–20. Black chalk on heavy wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2040.
